WorkItem.ClosedComment: I am not sure whether that is a factor but I cannot say I recall seeing a similar issue on any of our supported operating systems. If you do see it on one of those feel free to re-open this or log a new issue.
WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded and installed TypeScript 0.8.2 from http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34790 to be used within VS2012 Ultimate edition running in a Windows Server 2008 R2 Enterprise (2 Intel Xeon @ 2.13GHz, 8 GB)

After adding a TypeScript file to it, when I reopen the solution VS 2012 displays the messages "(initializing)" and hangs

I know now that my Operating System is not listed as supported but I'm wonder if that has something to do (or not) with the issue I'm experiencing.

Any help on this is very appreciated
WorkItem.Summary: VS2012 hangs when having TypeScript items in it
